name: A Goo Adventure
description: A goo Adventure is a physics puzzle plat-former where you will play in multiple worlds, buying skills and items to help you complete your quest
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Standard HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Standard sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 260 Or AMD Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Standard sound card
